entry.title: The German Government BKA (~German FBI) wallet sold ~6,5k $BTC in the last 6 hrs. It still holds 43k BTC, worth around $2.8 billion. The funds come fr...
entry.summary:
The German Government BKA (~German FBI) wallet sold ~6,5k $BTC in the last 6 hrs. It still holds 43k BTC, worth around $2.8 billion. The funds come from seizure of the Movie2k website operator https://x.com/ArkhamIntel/status/1752761784639881396
Arkham:â€‚The German Government is now on Arkham. The German Federal Criminal Police Office (BKA) seized almost 50,000 BTC ($2.12B) from the operators of http://Movie2k.to, a film piracy website that was active in 2013. The BKA received the Bitcoin in mid-January after a â€˜voluntaryâ€¦

entry.summary: RTâ€‚Ross Ulbricht Last night, Donald Trump pledged to commute my sentence on day 1, if reelected. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. After 11 years in prison, it is hard to express how I feel at this moment. It is thanks to your undying support that I may get a second chance.
